Actions.ActionName: Only allow one KMFAM macro at a time
Set Variable ‘Instance_ActionName’ to Text ‘’ - probably not necessary
Set PickList Size and Window Height variables
We were told to abort and call Insert Action by Name
If we have some text, type it into the Insert Action by Name dialog
If an Action or Macro was selected, Insert it or Run it.

Actions.Text: tell application "System Events"	tell process "Keyboard Maestro"		get focused of text field 1 of scroll area 3 of splitter group 1 of group 1 of window "Keyboard Maestro Editor"	end tellend tell

Actions.ActionName: Focus the Action editor, if needed.
